text: Tamavua kesga hutma monarega negeta, anazanke hutma mopafina keho, tevegumo hiaza huno, monaramimo'a vaganeresnigeno, tavaravemo hiaza huno ama mopamo'a atafa neresnigeno, ama mopafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za kosima friaza hu'za frigahaze. Hianagi fatgo navu'nava'ma hu'na vahe'ma zamagu vazi'na ete zamavare navu'nava zamo'a vagaore mevava hugahie.
